User Guide for Industry Financial Analysis Platform

Hongyu Yin

2025-10-31

financial-analysis-guide.Rmd

Summary

This package, based on the Osiris dataset, provides comprehensive industry financial ratio analysis capabilities.

About the Dataset

The dataset contains financial metrics for nine industries from 2017 to 2021: - Basic Materials (BAS)、Consumer Services (CSD)、Consumer Products (CST) - Energy (ENE)、Financials (FIN)、Healthcare (HEA)
- Industrials (IND)、Real Estate (REA)、Technology (TEC)

Core Features

1. Trend Analysis

  • Multi-Industry Financial Metrics Time Series Analysis
  • Customizable Year Ranges and Data Metrics
  • Support for Multiple Chart Types

2. Industry Comparison

  • Cross-industry performance benchmarking
  • Multidimensional radar chart comparison
  • Bubble chart relationship analysis

3. Intelligent Insights

  • Automatically identifies top-growing industries
  • Provides analytical recommendations
  • Detects outliers

Use Case

```r # Install and then load the package. library(HongyuFinancialAnalysis)

View Dataset

data(financial_data) head(financial_data)

Launch Analysis App

launch_app()
